actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a refundable credit of $500 to public safety volunteers.
short_title: Volunteer First Responders Tax Relief Act of 2004

summary.text: Volunteer First Responders Tax Relief Act of 2004 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a refundable tax credit of $500 to an individual who volunteers for more than half of the taxable year with a public safety organization, including any organization of firefighters, emergency medical personnel, or other first responders to emergencies.

titles.title: Volunteer First Responders Tax Relief Act of 2004
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a refundable credit of $500 to public safety volunteers.
